name: Hold the Phone
description:
Originally created for the Opera GX Mobile No Internet Jam

Hold the Phone is a short and sweet arcade style game where you must collect WIFI signals to stop your connection dropping out, dodging buffering as you go. Originally made for mobile browsers, this version is currently adapted for desktop browsers.

Made in collaboration with squishyturtles and CWeed420

CONTROLS:

-  Press A/D or Left/Right Arrow Keys to Change Direction

Check out my other games here
